data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Kansas to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kansas, United States
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Kansas, United States that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Kansas, United States by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Kansas, United States.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Jew, English-speaking people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, help the stressed and anxious in Kansas, United States know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Kansas do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kansas, United States has a population of 2,912,700.

We estimate Kansas has 769,133 people who might know Jesus, 1,458,817 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 684,750 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 769,133 believers in Kansas and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.
